old man.description: An old man stands on the footpath, watching the square with a distant, unfocused gaze.

shop Keeper.description: The shop keeper stands behind the counter, eyeing you like every coin in your pocket already belongs to him.

turf king.description: The Turf King stands ankle-deep in the muck, surveying the bog as if it were his personal kingdom.

turf minion 1.description: A wiry minion stands beside the Turf King, gripping a stick like he’s itching to use it.

turf minion 2.description: A heavier minion squares up as you enter, his fists already raised in anticipation.

squirrel.description: A jittery squirrel scurries across the forest floor, pausing only long enough to glare at you.

tommy tight fist.description: Tommy Tight Fist sits hunched at the bar, clutching your car’s spark plug in a white-knuckle grip.

billy big bollocks.description: Billy Big Bollocks stands in the shadows flexing proudly, your car key dangling from the chain around his neck.

farmer.description: A tired farmer works by the barn, replacing a lantern with what is unmistakably your car’s headlights.
